store_info.description: MINISO is an international product retailer, offering high-quality household goods, cosmetics, and food at affordable prices. Founded by CEO Ye Guofu, MINISO has opened more than 4,200 stores in over 80 countries and regions since 2013, including the US, UK, Canada, Australia, Spain, UAE, India, and Mexico.

categories.description: Trendy and functional bags, wallets, and travel accessories designed for everyday use.
Essentials for home, travel, and work, including storage solutions, hygiene products, and cleaning tools.
High-quality electronic accessories like headphones, power banks, and mobile accessories.
Stylish and affordable jewelry, sunglasses, hats, and scarves.
Skincare, cosmetics, and wellness products designed for self-care and beauty.
Decor, kitchenware, home fragrances, and lifestyle products for a modern home.
Limited edition collections and festive items for various occasions.
Notebooks, pens, planners, and creative gift ideas for students and professionals.
Soft and comfortable fabrics, including blankets, cushions, and towels.
Plush toys, action figures, and fun gadgets for kids and collectors.

new_arrivals.name: Sushi Kitten Plush Toy
new_arrivals.description: A soft and adorable sushi-inspired kitten plush toy, perfect for cuddling.

new_arrivals.name: Fantasy Eau de Parfum (Wonder of Light)
new_arrivals.description: A luxurious floral fragrance with notes of jasmine, vanilla, and musk.

top_sellers.name: 3-in-1 Makeup Brush
top_sellers.description: A compact and versatile makeup brush for foundation, blush, and contouring.

top_sellers.name: Scented Candles
top_sellers.description: Aromatherapy candles with soothing lavender and vanilla scents.

popular_products.name: Miniso Rose Nourishing Concealer
popular_products.description: Lightweight and hydrating concealer that provides smooth coverage.

popular_products.name: Luxury Series 3-Candlewick Scented Candle
popular_products.description: Premium 3-wick scented candle with a long-lasting aroma.

store_locations.address: Miniso, Ground Floor, Building 10A, Cybercity, Gurugram
74, Mehrauli-Gurgaon Rd, Maruti Housing Colony, Sector 17, Gurugram

customer_testimonials.testimonial: I am always thrilled to shop at MINISO. Quality products, cute designs, soooo many fab products and GREAT prices!
I bought a noodle bowl and storage boxes. I was pleased with the packaging and quality!

loyalty_program.name: MINISO Rewards
benefits: Early access to sales and new collections

frequently_asked_questions.question: Do you offer home delivery?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Yes, Miniso India provides home delivery for online orders placed on our website.

frequently_asked_questions.question: What is the return policy?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Products can be returned within 7 days of purchase with the original receipt, provided they are unused and in original packaging.
